programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 19 Cardinals (22-6, 15-2) roll into their ACC affair with the Panthers (16-12, 7-10). Louisville has won six straight and 16 of its last 17 games, including an 82-78 triumph over Pittsburgh on Jan. 11 behind seven 3-pointers from Reyne Smith.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Sun Devils play their first Big 12 game as they visit the Cougars. The schools met in the 2023 Vegas Showdown, with BYU pummeling Arizona State 77-49. Malian senior Fousseyni Traore (BYU) had six points, nine rebounds and five assists in the win.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Big 12 action brings the Bearcats (12-6, 2-5) to the Rockies for a match with the Cougars (12-6, 3-4). Cincinnati scored a 71-60 victory over BYU last season. Cougars scoring leader Richie Saunders totaled 79 points over his last four contests.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Bears roam into the Marriott Center for a match with the Cougars. Baylor has won its past two after beating Utah on Jan. 25. Norchad Omier recorded his ninth double-double of the season in that win. Baylor is 2-4 in true road games in 2024-25.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 23 Jayhawks (17-8, 8-6 Big 12) try to salvage their Beehive State trip when they face the Cougars (17-8, 8-6). Kansas fell to Utah 74-67 on Feb. 15. Dallin Hall scored 18 points to lead BYU past Kansas at Allen Fieldhouse 76-68 last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Coming off a historic win, the Cougars (18-8, 9-6 Big 12) visit the No. 19 Wildcats (18-8, 12-3). BYU handed No. 23 Kansas one of the most lopsided losses of Bill Self's tenure by dismantling the Jayhawks 91-57 on Feb. 18. Arizona is 11-2 at home.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 15 Bulldogs host the in-state rival No. 21 Rebels. Mississippi State has lost two in a row to top-10 Kentucky and No. 1 Auburn. Ole Miss toppled No. 4 Alabama for a fourth straight win Jan. 14. The Bulldogs won four of the last five meetings.

programme.title: Birth of a Dynasty
programme.desc: The 1999-2000 off-season was a sea change for the Lakers, defined by the arrival of Phil Jackson and the move from the beloved Forum into brand new STAPLES Center. It also started with a setback of a Kobe Bryant hand injury.

programme.title: Birth of a Dynasty
programme.desc: Shaquille O'Neal's renewed focus and dedication takes his game to new heights, resulting with his first MVP award. The team also barrels its way towards one of the best regular seasons in franchise history.

programme.title: Birth of a Dynasty
programme.desc: The playoff run includes a first-round series win over the Kings. A hard fought Western Conference Finals between the Lakers and Blazers comes down to an incredible 4th quarter in Game 7, with the Lakers down 15 and on the brink of elimination.

programme.title: Birth of a Dynasty
programme.desc: After completing one of the greatest fourth quarter comebacks in NBA history, the Lakers prevail in the NBA Finals over the Indiana Pacers in six games, with a monumental celebration outside STAPLES Center.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Dorian Finney-Smith and Shake Milton get familiar with their new team; Lindsey Harding reflects on her journey, becoming the first female assistant coach in team history. Plus, Anthony Davis and others get mind readings by mentalist Oz Pearlman.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Luka Doncic arrives in LA and gets acquainted with his new team. A look at how the Lakers organization provided support in the wake of the recent wildfires. The statue of Kobe and Gigi Bryant is unveiled.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Showtime legend Michael Cooper is inducted into the hall of fame and gets his jersey retired at Crypto. Luka Doncic plays his former team for the first time since the trade.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Head coach JJ Redick does his part to help rebuild the communities devastated by the wildfires, while Jarred Vanderbilt shows off his love for fashion away from the court. Plus, Dalton Knecht takes us through the ups and downs of his rookie season.
